thread.section_title: AMR Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of AMR | amr.com.au
thread.title: Sarah Bateman

author: Sarah Bateman
title: Sarah Bateman
text:
Although I am a little disappointed.
I emailed before I purchased to ensure the plug and sockets had been converted to AUS plug and sockets as the photo the socket was European. Was emailed back with a "YES" they have been... NO they're not. The power cord is but not the socket. So I have to use a converter plug with it which is really a bit painful. Also would have like to have know the weight of the case. By the time it's filled with stuff it becomes quite "un-portable" it's very heavy. I guess I assumed it would have been made with a bit lighter material.
But good customer service when I called after with a postal issue. Sent pretty quickly.
